text: How to Train Your Dragon 2 is a 2015 3D American computer-animated action fantasy movie and the second installment in the series. A sequel to How to Train Your Dragon, It is directed and written by Dean DeBlois, It stars the voices of Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera, Jonah Hill, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, T.J. Miller, and Kristen Wiig. == Voice cast == * Jay Baruchel as Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III * America Ferrera as Astrid Hofferson * Cate Blanchett as Valka * Gerard Butler as Stoick the Vast * Craig Ferguson as Gobber the Belch * Christopher Mintz-Plasse as Fishlegs Ingerman * Jonah Hill as Snotlout Jorgenson * T.J. Miller and Kristen Wiig as Tuffnut and Ruffnut Thorston * Djimon Hounsou as Drago Bludvist * Kit Harington as Eret == References == == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:2010s 3D movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2014 action movies Category:2014 computer-animated movies Category:2014 fantasy movies Category:DreamWorks Animation movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:Movies about dragons Category:American 3D animated movies
title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
